page.title: 14A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: I wake up in the morning at 7.30am and get dressed and then go down stairs and have my breakast, which is cornflakes and sometimes toast.Then I go and get my bike ready for school, while mum gets my packed lunch ready.Then I go upstairs and have a wash and then I bike to school with my best friend.When we get to school we have an assembley and then we do work.We have two breaks and a dinner hour.We go home at 3.15pm.I watch the T.V.until tea sometimes.We have tea at 6pm and then at 9.00pm I go to bed but I read till 11.00,when I go to sleep. Lindsey Age 11. Lindsey goes to Harthill County Primary School.
